author: Courtney Kube
title: Navy expected to relieve captain who raised alarm about COVID-19 on ship
description: Capt. Brett Crozier raised the alarm earlier this week that sailors on the USS Theodore Roosevelt needed to be quarantined to stop the spread of the virus.
content:
The Navy is expected to announce it has relieved the captain who sounded the alarm about an outbreak of COVID-19 aboard the USS Theodore Roosevelt, according to two U.S. officials.
Capt. Brett Crozier of the USS Theodore Roosevelt.U.S. Navy
